description: Cisco IOS XE and the Catalyst 9300 switch using the gRPC Dial-Out Model-Driven Telemetry interface to provide basic health and interface monitoring capabilities

targets.query: SELECT * FROM "Cisco-IOS-XE-memory-oper:memory-statistics/memory-statistic" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$SOURCE$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY *
SELECT * FROM "Cisco-IOS-XE-process-cpu-oper:cpu-usage/cpu-utilization" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$SOURCE$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY *
SELECT *,last("matm_mac_entry/mac") AS "matm_mac_entry/port" FROM "Cisco-IOS-XE-matm-oper:matm-oper-data/matm-table" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$SOURCE$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY *
SELECT * FROM "Cisco-IOS-XE-environment-oper:environment-sensors/environment-sensor" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$SOURCE$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY *
SELECT * FROM "Cisco-IOS-XE-platform-oper:components/component" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$SOURCE$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY *
SELECT *, last("base/xpath") AS "base/xpath" FROM "Cisco-IOS-XE-mdt-oper:mdt-oper-data/mdt-subscriptions" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$SOURCE$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY *
SELECT *,last("last_change") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XE-interfaces-oper:interfaces/interface" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$SOURCE$/ AND "name" =~ /^$NAME$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY *
SELECT *,last("last_clear") FROM "openconfig-interfaces:interfaces/interface/state/counters" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$SOURCE$/ AND "name" =~ /^$NAME$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY *
SELECT *,last("phys_address") FROM "ietf-interfaces:interfaces-state/interface" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$SOURCE$/ AND "name" =~ /^$NAME$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY *

title: Device Health Monitoring
